data.title: Very casual dining with great food, but prepare to take your time.
data.text: The ribs are some of the best around, the salads are large and delicious, the fried pickles and onion rings are great. BUT the service is slow. Consistently. So if you don't mind waiting for your food, you will enjoy it!

data.title: Excellent chicken tenders
data.text: This is a nice casual place for lunch or dinner.   The kids can play around outside or in the game room.  They have good fried food, it doesn't taste like they went to sams and put it in the basket.  We like the family platter that has fries, fried shrimp, catfish and chicken tenders.  It all tastes fresh which is important.

data.title: Great casual ice-house like environment and good
data.text: If you are looking for good burgers, salads, as well as chicken and fish dishes, frozen drinks and beer, and a ice-house, sports-bar like environment, you can't go wrong with Willie's. There is even nice outdoor seating when weather permits.

data.title: A clasic Texas Ice House feel with good food
data.text:
A fun spot for the family. High energy environment with lots of flat screens playing different sports and a big sand box for the kids. Enjoy one of the, to many to count, ice downed beers, order at the counter and be served at your table.
Burgers, to fried Shrimp, to Chicken Fried steak..Willie's has something for everyone in a laid back TEXAS KINDA PLACE

data.title: Family Dinner
data.text: What a fun place for the whole family...great outside play area for the kids...wide menu variety...nice selection of beer as well!

data.title: Have not been there in 5 years
data.text: Have not been back since at least 2011 and this place is within 2 miles of my house.      Service was pretty pour and I was informed at that time some items on the menu were not available.  I entered the establishment around 7:00 pm one evening.  I found it incredible that others were offered service before I was while standing in line.  This was on a Friday night.  I asked to speak to the manager and was informed the manager was not on the premises.  I left my business card with the staff that night and asked that the manager contact me later when she was on site I guess later the next week.  She never contacted me.  I found this behavior  peculiar since my company at that time did a lot of catering with this establishment.I have found this same level of service at the other Willies restaurants I have visited at 290 and West Little York (which is now closed)and the one located at 290 at Jone's road.  Orders were never complete as advertised and one time received the wrong food(290 and Jones Rd).  I will admit that I recently visited the location on Hwy 249 which was very pleasing and service was excellent.  Went here because of my business schedule that day and had no other choice.

data.title: Nice, friendly atmosphere
data.text: Love the hamburgers, gumbo is great staff is friendly a good place to relax and have fun.  Indoor and outdoor seating.

data.title: Pretty darn good eats!
data.text: My wife and I go here regularly and have always enjoyed it. They do a very good job with the food, and it's quick. The servers do a great job and are always attentive. Fun place to grab something to eat.

data.title: Late Lunch on Saturday
data.text:
Staff taking order was prompt and correct in answers to my questions, which allowed me to place an order to meet my needs. Wait staff was friendly, professional and attentive. Food temps  were just right-hot fried catfish and cold salad and slaw. 
Order taking is different in that one takes your order and fulfills your beverage choice. Then at the table you select a wait person checks your order and turns it into the kitchen. 
Not a white tablecloth place.

data.title: good place to sit, eat and drink.
data.text: Excellent atmosphere for a spots fan and luncheon . parking is ok sometimes you have to wait in line. ok with children, family and friends and or single.

data.title: Terrific Service!
data.text: Enjoyed a great lunch with mom and the service was terrific. The food is always good at any Willies, and the price if great!

data.title: Always Love Willie's
data.text: We have been going to this Willie's in Sugar Land ever since it opened.  Great service, great food and always a great value.  When the kids were on baseball teams, it was always the place of choice to feed the hungry boys!  Since we are on a fixed income now, we really appreciate the "buy one get one" coupons that Willie's offers!

data.title: Good food and Great service.
data.text:
"Great food,wonderful service and averagely priced” All the employees were very friendly.  04/17/2016 
“Excellent food and service”

data.title: Nice atmosphere and good food
data.text:
Nice bright colored restaurant with comfortable casual atmosphere.  Great patio seating on a nice day.  You place your order at the counter but then received table service by a waiter.  Decent price and proportion for lunch.  

I really enjoyed the catfish.  It was really freshly fried and crispy with a good batter.

data.title: Really enjoyed our crawfish
data.text:
Plenty of crawfish at a decent price.
Friendly and attentive waitstaff.
It is pretty spicy, so if your tolerance is low, like mine, be prepared.
Sign up for their e-mails for coupons.

data.title: Not what I expected
data.text: When there with my family as they live near here was a little disappointed with the shrimp that I had looked like it came from wal mart freezer. Didn't like that we had to order everything before we sat down

data.title: Eclectic Restaurant/Bar with a nice patio area! (and Sandbox?)
data.text: First, I'll say that I did enjoy the atmosphere and food here. There were a few quirks that I find worth mentioning though... when you enter the restaurant, you have to order your drinks and food from the bar before seating yourself somewhere inside or on the patio. This is probably fine for regulars, but as first time visitors, we felt rushed by the people standing in line behind us waiting to order while we tried to decide what to get. Then, it was a beautiful day, so we decided to eat on the patio, which was great except for the large tree overhead dropping seed pods into our drinks and on our food. And then there was the sandbox... this was a first for us, seeing sandbox complete with children's toys (and playing children). I'm not saying there was anything wrong with this... it was just different. The Icehouse burger I ordered was quite good though, and we enjoyed sitting in the sun and listening to music while eating lunch.

data.title: Good food large portions
data.text:
The food is consistently good quality, excellent service.  My brother's favorite place
to eat in Sugar Land.

data.title: Not what I expected
data.text: Looked like bar from the highway. Turns out it was a great with a lot of atmosphere. Three in my party, and each ordered something different. Shrimp tacos, smothered chicken and a Willie burger w/chile. The Brownie with ice cream was big enough for us to share.  All were very good. Outstanding service. You self order, which was a little confusing as there was no one to guide us since it was our first time. A hostess would have helped. Family friendly with TVs every where. We will be back.

data.title: good food, decent prices
data.text: My family enjoys going there as the food is good and they offer an outdoor sand pit so children can be having fun while the adults are enjoying their meal.  You place your order and when it is done it is brought out to you.  They have many TVs so you can watch your game while enjoying your meal.  I always have one of their salads since it is healthy and delicious.  They have a back room where you can hold a small party.
